title: How to Make Bologna Wiggles

steps.headline: Place the bologna slices on top of each other.
Use a knife to cut the bologna into thin strips.
Place the strips in a bowl and toss them with your hands to separate them from each other.
Spread the salad dressing on both sides of the hamburger bun.
Put a handful of the bologna strips onto the bottom bun and place the top bun on top of the bologna.

text: Place the bologna slices on top of each other.  Use a knife to cut the bologna into thin strips.  Place the strips in a bowl and toss them with your hands to separate them from each other.  Spread the salad dressing on both sides of the hamburger bun.  Put a handful of the bologna strips onto the bottom bun and place the top bun on top of the bologna.  Finished.
